name: CHAOS CONDUCTOR
description:
Goal: 

Survive the DEMON TRAIN as its conductor. Fight off swarms of demons who want to destroy you. Fuel the train with the essence of demons (the best known fuel source in the west). Every 10 seconds the train loses fuel, so make sure to hold down that refuel button!

Controls:

Use WASD to run and jump.
Aim with Mouse and Left Click to shoot.
Click the Fill Souls button on the train to refuel using soul orbs.

Credits: 

Cope – Lead Programmer 

Memes – Programmer & Sound Effects 

Ricky Owings – Music, Programmer, Sound Effects 

TheFlanMan – Art and Graphics

Luxcy – Sound Effects
